dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1213 IH: Restoring Effective Science-based Conservation Under Environmental laws protecting Whales Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grijalva (for himself, Mr. Beyer, Mrs. Dingell, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Neguse, Ms. Porter, Mr. Sablan, and Ms. Stansbury) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023 by repealing certain provisions relating to North Atlantic right whales.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Restoring Effective Science-based Conservation Under Environmental laws protecting Whales Act of 2023 or the RESCUE Whales Act of 2023.
Title I of division JJ of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023 (Public Law 117â€“328) is repealed.
